About Me

Hi, my name is jigyasu and I’m a senior data engineer. As well as buidling data warehouses, I have experience developing and migrating analytics modules for cutsomer and retail analytics companies. with passion to learn and upgrade, I can build API’s as well as write SQL queries to bring analytical inferences for the mission critical businesses.

I have 8 Years of extensive IT experience falling in finance and retail domain. Data management has remain constant throughout this whole journey. I beleive if structure is provided to anything it become comprehensive and enable more possibilities. I provide that structure to the data to enable analytical teams and unravel all the new possiblities. This seed helps businesses take logical decision which pushes their revenues to next level.

Projects

Intrado Warehousing

Telecom product moving to cloud

This project was classic migration project from On-prem to GCP. This includes stream loads, batch loads, ELT loads. we utilized all the GCP offering like Dataflow, Apache Beam, cloud Functions, Pub-Sub, Bigquery, Dataproc, Cloud Run. we utilized cloud monitoring for service now integration. CI/CD pipeline was integrated with Github and Terraform was used extensively for IAAS.

Tesco onsite media

Big Data product to provide 360 view of campaign

This Project was complete Big data legacy product built on Spark and hadoop platform. Providing wholesome view of targeted media and campaign performance under same umbrela by generating more than 1200 KPI’s.

Foodpanda Warehousing

This Hybrid project consist of Data migration, warehouse foundation, ML operations and analytical operations.

I worked on this project as part of my Delivery Hero stint. The Project was mainly python intensive since we orchestrated basically everything using Airflow. Also consumed DBT for analytical report models. The main task was to lay multiple pipeline to move data from AWS to GCP and provide the warehousing at bigquery.

Senior Data Engineer

EPAM

Emerging IT service company with top class talent and best projects in the market

During this stint I helped a telecom service provider migrate from on prem infra to cloud services. started from scratch and layed the foundation for warehousing needs utilised all the GCP offerings to provide scalable, robust business process system. laid the foundation of best development practices for continuous development and deployment. utilising cloud build to orchestrate between different deployments. gave intrado flexibility to expand from 8 streaming pipeline to 56 streaming pipelines and onboard multiple customers with smooth intergration.

Being experienced in Spark and Python I assisted many teams migrate their Oracle workload to hadoop. single handedly drive the development of Onsite media product on GCP. with this, provided cost effective approach and bring down the rundown cost by 70%.
